instructions.name: collectWeeklyManagementFees
docs: Collect accrued management fees from vault USDC and distribute 70/30

accounts.name: vaultStablecoinAccount
docs: Vault's USDC account to pay fees from

instructions.name: createVault
docs: Create a new vault with underlying assets and management fees

accounts.name: vaultTokenAccount
docs: Vault token account for holding vault tokens

accounts.name: stablecoinMint
docs: Stablecoin mint used to pay creation fee (e.g. USDC)

accounts.name: adminStablecoinAccount
docs: Admin's stablecoin token account (payer of creation fee)

accounts.name: factoryAdminStablecoinAccount
docs: Factory admin's stablecoin token account (recipient of creation fee)

instructions.name: deposit
docs: Deposit any stablecoin into the vault and receive vault tokens

accounts.name: userStablecoinAccount
docs: User's stablecoin token account (any stablecoin like USDC, USDT, etc.)

accounts.name: vaultStablecoinAccount
docs: Vault's stablecoin token account (to receive deposits)

accounts.name: userVaultAccount
docs: User's vault token account (to receive vault tokens)

accounts.name: vaultAdminStablecoinAccount
docs: Vault admin's stablecoin token account (to receive management fees)

accounts.name: jupiterProgram
docs: Jupiter program account (optional - only needed if Jupiter swap is provided)

instructions.name: distributeAccruedFees
docs: Distribute accrued management fees as vault tokens to vault creator and platform
This aligns fee recipients with vault performance by giving them vault shares

accounts.name: vaultMint
docs: Vault token mint (for minting fee shares)

accounts.name: vaultAdminVaultAccount
docs: Vault admin's vault token account (receives vault creator share)

accounts.name: feeRecipientVaultAccount
docs: Platform fee recipient's vault token account (receives platform share)

instructions.name: executeSwaps
docs: Execute Jupiter swaps for vault's USDC into underlying assets

accounts.name: executor
docs: Vault admin or authorized user executing swaps

accounts.name: vaultStablecoinAccount
docs: Vault's stablecoin token account (source of USDC for swaps)

instructions.name: finalizeRedeem
docs: Finalize redeem: burn tokens and settle fees/net USDC

accounts.name: userVaultAccount
docs: User's vault token account (to burn from)

accounts.name: vaultStablecoinAccount
docs: Vault USDC PDA account (source of USDC, filled by client swaps)

accounts.name: vaultAdminStablecoinAccount
docs: Vault admin USDC account (management fee share)

instructions.name: getAccruedManagementFees
docs: Get and update accrued management fees for a vault
This function calculates newly accrued fees using live asset prices and balances

instructions.name: getDepositDetails
docs: Get deposit details for a user and vault

accounts.name: user
docs: User to get deposit details for

instructions.name: getFactoryInfo
docs: Get factory information including vault count

instructions.name: getVaultFees
docs: Get vault fees (factory fees + vault management fees)

instructions.name: initializeFactory
docs: Initialize the Factory PDA with fee params and admin

accounts.name: admin
docs: Admin who pays rent and becomes the factory admin

instructions.name: redeem
docs: Redeem vault tokens and receive back the underlying stablecoin

accounts.name: userVaultAccount
docs: User's vault token account (to burn tokens from)

accounts.name: userStablecoinAccount
docs: User's stablecoin token account (to receive stablecoin)

accounts.name: vaultStablecoinAccount
docs: Vault's stablecoin token account (to send stablecoin from)

accounts.name: vaultAdminStablecoinAccount
docs: Vault admin's stablecoin token account (to receive management fees)

accounts.name: jupiterProgram
docs: Jupiter program account (optional - only needed if Jupiter swap is provided)

instructions.name: setVaultPaused
docs: Set vault paused or active (admin only)

instructions.name: transferVaultToUser
docs: Transfer USDC from vault to user for swapping

accounts.name: user
docs: User receiving the USDC from vault

instructions.name: updateFactoryFees
docs: Update factory fees (only admin can call this)

accounts.name: admin
docs: Admin who can update factory fees

instructions.name: withdrawUnderlyingToUser
docs: Withdraw underlying asset from vault to user (for client-side redeem swaps)

accounts.name: vaultAssetAccount
docs: Source: vault's ATA for the asset

accounts.name: userAssetAccount
docs: Destination: user's ATA for the asset
